text: chaur komaoy banda anak del mean chomnue yk puok del kmean chomnue thveuchea anak keapear phe sa ng pi banda anak del mean chomnue aoy saoh . haey anaknea thveu dauchnaoh ke brakadchea minban ttuol avei pi a l laoh laey leuklengte puok del khlach puokke bonnaoh . haey a l laoh promean puok anak nouv tearounakamm robsa trong . haey tow champoh a l laoh kuchea kanleng vilotralb chongokraoy
